title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 443.5 - Listing of accounts-income statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 443.5 - Listing of accounts-income statement

State Regulations
[2300]
(a) For the new reporting requirements
contained in the following subdivisions of this section, the initial reporting
year is indicated in parentheses. For example, Accounts 3620/6620 - Skilled

Nursing Care Medicaid Certified in subdivision (b) paragraph (4) of this
section has 1980 in parentheses. This means this cost center must be reported
for the reporting period beginning in 1980 and thereafter. All other cost
centers are required to be reported for reporting periods ending in 1979 and
thereafter. (b) DAILY HOSPITAL
SERVICES [2310]

ยง
443.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
